professionalExperience.title: Counter Staff
professionalExperience.details: Learned daily tasks of the restaurant and maintained store cleanliness and safety.

professionalExperience.title: Team Leader
professionalExperience.details: Assisted managers, managed small groups of staff, and learned complex procedures such as closing, handling power outages, and crowd control. Acted as an apprentice to my manager, covering their duties during days off.

professionalExperience.title: Shift Leader
professionalExperience.details: Trained further to bridge the skill gap between managing a small team and overseeing an entire shift. This role involves ensuring the smooth operation and wellbeing of the restaurant during my shift.
